ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ceqsexg.1 | |- F/ x ps |

| 4 |  | #P_nfe1 | |- F/ x E. x ( x = A /\ ph ) |
| 5 | 4, 1 | #P_nfbi | |- F/ x ( E. x ( x = A /\ ph ) <-> ps ) |

| 7 | 6, 2 | #P_bibi12d | |- ( x = A -> ( ( ph <-> ph ) <-> ( E. x ( x = A /\ ph ) <-> ps ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_biid | |- ( ph <-> ph ) |
| 9 | 3, 5, 7, 8 | #P_vtoclgf | |- ( A e. V -> ( E. x ( x = A /\ ph ) <-> ps ) ) |
